Version 2.0.67 - Fix Progress 0% on Resume & False Completion

Bug Fixes

  • Fix progress stuck at 0% on resume: generic detection was skipped when SCORM API had position (lastSlide > 1), preventing TOTAL_SLIDES discovery
  • Fix furthestSlide lost on new tab/browser restart: read from Moodle lesson_location as fallback when sessionStorage is empty
  • Fix score exceeding 100% on resume when slide count not yet detected (e.g. 3/1 * 100 = 300%)
  • Fix false activity completion triggered by inflated scores on page refresh

Changes

  • Generic detection now always discovers TOTAL_SLIDES even when SCORM API position tracking is active
  • Re-sends progress with correct totalSlides when total is first detected
  • Guard all score calculations with slidescount > 1 and cap at 100%
  • Both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004 code paths fixed

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.66: Auto-grade Basic SCORM from furthest slide progress
  • v2.0.65: Fix stale interceptor reads, furthestSlide for Basic SCORM
  • v2.0.64: Fix backward nav, faster generic detection
